654540.name: Black The Fall: Collector's Upgrade
654540.description:
Black The Fall's Collector's Upgrade includes the game's full digital soundtrack, alongside a PDF artbook containing imagery from throughout the game's development process.

Soundtrack listing:
Track 1 [04:49]: Dessolation
Track 2 [04:50]: Dissonant
Track 3 [05:31]: Glitch
Track 4 [06:24]: Hope
Track 5 [14:41]: Landscape For Every Escapism
Track 6 [02:29]: Outside
Track 7 [10:51]: Postlude
Track 8 [03:03]: Step Into The Light
Track 9 [08:08]: The King Is Dead
Track 10 [04:42]: Unexpected Friend
Track 11 [03:41]: Uplifting
Track 12 [02:35]: Void
654540.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文
